---
title: PlistNativeMethods.plist_get_uint_val method
---

Get the value of a #PLIST_UINT node. This function does nothing if node is not of type #PLIST_UINT

```csharp
public static void plist_get_uint_val(PlistHandle node, ref ulong val)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| node | the node |
| val | a pointer to a uint64_t variable. |
